actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the operator of any airport to prohibit the operation of certain types of aircraft at the airport in order to control and abate aircraft noise resulting from the operation of the airport.

summary.text: Authorizes airport operators to prohibit, on a nondiscriminatory basis, at such airport for the purpose of controlling and abating aircraft noise.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the operator of any airport to prohibit the operation of certain types of aircraft at the airport in order to control and abate aircraft noise resulting from the operation of the airport.
